{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54GS |revision=v4.0 |series=WRT54GS |serialnum_prefix=CGN6 |fcc_date=05/31/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WT54GV40 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5352E |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=4 |ram1=16 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5352E |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,Tomato,OpenWrt,TomatoUSB, Broadband-Hamnet |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:BF,00:16:B6 |oui_eth=00:14:BF,00:16:B6 |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router with SpeedBooster}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54GS}} Wikipedia states that some of these devices have 8MB Flash and 32MB RAM. {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT54GS_v4.0}} [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_WRT54G_series WRT54G series on Wikipedia]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRT54G/GL/GS/GX Linksys WRT54Gxx page on the DD-WRT wiki]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wrt54gs Linksys WRT54G, WRT54GL and WRT54GS page on the OpenWrt wiki]
